title: Network Fault Causes Mass Billing Errors
description: A network fault caused incorrect data usage metering for a batch of customers. An agent must identify the affected customers and correct their bills.

tasks.description: Acknowledge a network alert about a faulty data metering element.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the network element and the timeframe of the fault.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all customers whose data traffic passed through the faulty element during that time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries for a list of affected customer accounts.

tasks.description: Run a script to apply a corrective credit to all affected customer accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes a bulk operation to fix the billing errors.
